Entry.JapaneseText: アルベルト
Entry.EnglishText: Albert

Entry.JapaneseText: エトス
Entry.EnglishText: Ethos

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mel>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルン
Entry.EnglishText: Norn

Entry.JapaneseText: Variable
Entry.EnglishText: Variable

Entry.JapaneseText: へっへっへっへぇ〜。 やっとこ落ち着いただ〜
Entry.EnglishText: Hehehehehe! I'm surprised I made it in one piece from that fall!

Entry.JapaneseText: ところでさっきの話の 続きだけド……
Entry.EnglishText: In any case, please continue with what you were going to say...

Entry.JapaneseText: わーってるだぁ、 せかすでねーって。 んだば……
Entry.EnglishText: Cutting to the chase, eh? Let's get down to it then. So...

Entry.JapaneseText: おめぇら もう１３歳だなや？
Entry.EnglishText: You children are 13-years-old already, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: そういうことで、そろそろ 『なりきり士』の仕事を始める 年頃なわけだーよ
Entry.EnglishText: Seems you are about the age to start your job as Roleplayers.
Entry.Notes: Review. Should 『なりきり士』 = Roleplayer or Narikiri's , etc...

Entry.JapaneseText: 『なりきり士』……？
Entry.EnglishText: Roleplayers?

Entry.JapaneseText: おぉ『なりきり士』っつーのは、 その服装の人になりきる力を 持った人間のことを言うだ
Entry.EnglishText: Roleplayers are people who can borrow power from other people's clothing which in turn allows them to transform into what they wear, having the same abilities as the person who used that garment.

Entry.JapaneseText: 剣士の服を着れば立派な剣士で、 魔法使いの服を着てみれば、 魔法使いになれるっつー具合だ
Entry.EnglishText: If you wear a knight's clothing, you'll impersonate a splendid knight. If you wear magician's clothes, you'll become skilled in magic.

Entry.JapaneseText: おめぇらふたりには、 そんだら力が生まれたときから 宿っとるんだーよ
Entry.EnglishText: The two of you will have this power at your disposal for the rest of your lives.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしたちに？ まさか？
Entry.EnglishText: The two of us? Even me? You can't be serious...

Entry.JapaneseText: はん！ おらが信じられねぇってが？ このおらをか？ あ〜ん？
Entry.EnglishText: Hah! Do you dare doubt what I say?

Entry.JapaneseText: グダグダ言ってねぇで、 おらの中の服、 着てみりゃわかるだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm tired of explanations, so try some of the clothes I have inside me and see for yourselves.

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく、『なりきり士』の力で 困ってる人たちを 助ける仕事をするんだど
Entry.EnglishText: Anyhow, the most important mission you have as a Roleplayer is to help people in need.

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルン様はそれをおめぇらに 期待しとるっちゅーわけだ
Entry.EnglishText: Miss Norn has high expectations of you two.

Entry.JapaneseText: それ……すごいいいかも！
Entry.EnglishText: Piece of cake!

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ、困ってる人、 助けに行くよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll help all the troubled people out there in a jiffy!

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ、外に出る！ 『なりきり士』の仕事する！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go outside! It's time to start my job as a Roleplayer, right now!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなの…… <Dio>ひとりだけで 行かせられると思う？
Entry.EnglishText: Wait don't rush away just yet... did you even consider what it means to go alone?

Entry.JapaneseText: すぐ無茶するし、 危なっかしいし……
Entry.EnglishText: He is so dumb, it's so dangerous out there...

Entry.JapaneseText: わかった…… わたしも一緒に行く
Entry.EnglishText: I got it! I'll go too.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえも……！？
Entry.EnglishText: What!? You too!?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん。いいよ…… 行っておいで
Entry.EnglishText: All right... I'll allow the two of you to go.

Entry.JapaneseText: っしゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: Sweet!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何言ってるの。 エトも一緒だよ？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you mean, Eto? Aren't you coming as well?

Entry.JapaneseText: え……ぼくも…… 行っていいの？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? Is it really okay for me to go too?

Entry.JapaneseText: 一緒に行こ！
Entry.EnglishText: Of course! Let's go together!

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……
Entry.EnglishText: I see...

Entry.JapaneseText: うん！ <Dio>と<Mel>は ぼくの可愛い双子だもん。 ぼくも一緒でなきゃね！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah... Yeah... and and are such a fair pair of twins! I'll go wherever you want to go!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ？ 話はまとまっただな？ んだら、準備してやるだよ
Entry.EnglishText: Uh? Are we finished yapping now? Then, let's get started.

Entry.JapaneseText: 『なりきり士』のことを 教えてほしいだか？ ん？ ん？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you want to know more about Roleplayers? Mmm?

Entry.JapaneseText: まず<icon:40>3)でメニューを開くだ
『コスチューム』の項目で、 服を着ることができるだーよ。 今は１着ずつしかないんだど
Entry.EnglishText: In the "Costumes" section, you can change the clothes that you are wearing. Currently, we only have one piece of clothing each.
Entry.Notes: Just need reviewed by a translator.

Entry.JapaneseText: 『コスチューム』は世界の どこかに落ちてたりする もんだーよ
Entry.EnglishText: "Costumes" can be found anywhere in the world.
Entry.Notes: Just need reviewed by a translator.

Entry.JapaneseText: 服を着替えっと、 その服の格好に応じた 戦闘特性になるだで
Entry.EnglishText: Change Clothes: You can change to the outfit you want to wear.
Entry.Notes: Just need reviewed by a translator.

Entry.JapaneseText: おめぇらにわかりやすく教えっと、 『剣士』だと、 剣士としての能力が上がるだ
Entry.EnglishText: Let me make this easy for you. "Swordsman." It makes you a more skilled swordsman.
Entry.Notes: Just need reviewed by a translator.

Entry.JapaneseText: つまりだ、本物の剣士と同じよう に剣を振って攻撃ができるように なるんだでよ
Entry.EnglishText: You'll be able to swing a sword and attack just like a real swordsman.
Entry.Notes: Just need reviewed by a translator.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもただただ『コスチューム』 を集めて、着てるだけでは 芸がないんだべ
Entry.EnglishText: But just collecting "Costumes" and wearing them is not enough. there's no art in that.
Entry.Notes: Just need reviewed by a translator.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戦闘でもらえるＣＰっちゅーの を溜めると、熟練度が上がって スキルが開放できるだ
Entry.EnglishText: Using the CP you gain in battle, you can unlock skills and upgrade your skill level.
Entry.Notes: Just need reviewed by a translator.

Entry.JapaneseText: とまぁ、こんなところだ。おらが こんな説明までせねばなんねぇ とはまったくめんどうくせぇ
Entry.EnglishText: And, well, that's about it. To be the one that has to go through the trouble of explaining all this is a real pain!
Entry.Notes: Just need reviewed by a translator.

Entry.JapaneseText: それから、おらは豆粒みたいに ちっちゃくなって おめぇらについてくだーよ
Entry.EnglishText: Now then, I'll shrink to bean-size and keep an eye on you.

Entry.JapaneseText: あー、あとな、おらは、 魔物のいるところは、 絶対出ていがねぇからな
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, and I'll never appear when there's monsters around.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしても着替えてぇなら、 魔物のいない町中とか、 安全な場所にするだよ
Entry.EnglishText: I'll only show up when it's safe, like in a town.

Entry.JapaneseText: さ！ 行くか！
Entry.EnglishText: All right then! Let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: 行くって……どこへ？
Entry.EnglishText: Go? Where to?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>ヴァルハラ村<White>はどうかな？
Entry.EnglishText: How about we start in Valhalla Village?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>ヴァルハラ村<White>？
Entry.EnglishText: Valhalla Village?

Entry.JapaneseText: そう。ヴァルハラ平原に貧しい人たちが 移り住んで作った村なんだけド
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, poor people moved into the Valhalla Plains and built a village there.

Entry.JapaneseText: たくさん人が集まってる場所 なんだから、困ってる人だって きっといるんじゃないのかな
Entry.EnglishText: Many people settled there, I think there's a high chance someone needs help.

Entry.JapaneseText: んじゃー そこ行ってみようぜ
Entry.EnglishText: Ok then, let's head there!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたちの旅立ちに 祝福を……
Entry.EnglishText: May the trip you're setting off on be blessed...
